title: Cowboys, Bears, Tua Tagovailoa, and NFL playoffs
itunes:title: Cowboys, Bears, Tua Tagovailoa, and NFL playoffs
description:
Colin discusses Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones taking his time on what to do with HC Jason Garrett, why the Chicago Bears will continue to fail next season, Tua Tagovailoa saying he will decide his future on Monday, and who he likes in the NFL playoffs. Guests include Nick Wright, Greg Cosell, Brady Poppinga, and LaVar Arrington.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
